name: Randomizator
description:
Location - the scientific base for conducting experiments on the movement of matter in space and time.
The results were remarkable, but suddenly the situation changed. Powerful AI (used on the base) out of control.
AI take control this base.
AI blocked scientists in their labs.
You play as a scientist who has created a suit that can be used to generate portals in space. From using an experimental sample of the costume, the scientist was able to get out of his laboratory to stop AI.
